<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะตั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปะตฬั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">naglรฉc</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะตั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปะตัะฐฬ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะตั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปะตััฬ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะตั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปะตัะพฬะฒ</a></b>)

<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">derogatory</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> impudent / insolent fellow</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%86amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะปะตั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 5b  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

***ะฝะฐะณะปะพ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพ</a> (8765)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8Aamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะณะปั (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะณะปั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">naglลญ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">quick</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*naglั</i>. Per Vasmer, cognates include <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Sanskrit" class="extiw" title="w:Sanskrit">Sanskrit</a></span> <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%9E%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9C%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%BEamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="เคเคเฅเคเคธเคพ (page does not exist)">เคเคเฅเคเคธเคพ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">aรฑjasฤ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">soon, suddenly</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa">เคเคเฅเคเคธเฅ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">aรฑjas</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">instantly, quickly</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> and <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Gothic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Gothic language">Gothic</a></span> <i class="Goth mention" lang="got">๐ฐ๐ฝ๐ฐ๐บ๐</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Got-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">anaks</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">suddenly</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb_2">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกglo</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>impertinently, impudently
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพั.html>ะฒะพั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะดะฝะฐะถะดั.html>ะพะดะฝะฐฬะถะดั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะดะพะปะณะพ.html>ะฝะตะดะพฬะปะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดัะผะฐัั.html>ะดัฬะผะฐั</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพ</a></b> ะฝะฐะฟัะพัะธะปัั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฝะฐ.html>ะตั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะพะฒะพะถะฐัั.html>ะฟัะพะฒะพะถะฐฬัั</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">i vot odnรกลพdy ja, nedรณlgo dรบmaja, <b>nรกglo</b> naprosรญlsja jejรณ provoลพรกtสน</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">and then one day I, not thinking any further, <b>impertinently</b> asked to accompany her</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective_2">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกglo</span>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะปะพ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะณะป-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะพ</b>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพัะปะธัะฐัััั.html>ะพัะปะธัะฐฬััั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะพััั.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพัััั</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒััะฐะถะฐัั.html>ะฒััะฐะถะฐฬั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฝะฐ.html>ะตั</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพััััััะฒะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะัััฬัััะฒัะตั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธะผะตั.html>ะฟัะธะผะตฬั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปะตฬะฝะธั</a> (ัะผ. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะธัะฝัะน.html>ัะธะฝะธัะฝะพ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะตััััะดะฝัะน.html>ะฑะตััััะดะฝะพ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะตััะพะฒะตััะฝัะน.html>ะฑะตััะพฬะฒะตััะฝะพ</a>, ะฑะตะทะทะฐััะตะฝัะธะฒะพ, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะตััะตัะตะผะพะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฑะตััะตัะตะผะพฬะฝะฝะพ</a>, ะฝะตัะตัะตะผะพะฝะฝะพ, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะฒัะทะฝัะน.html>ัะฐะทะฒัฬะทะฝะพ</a>;</span> <span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะฐะปัะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐัะฐฬะปัะฝะพ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะตััััะถะธะน.html>ะฑะตััััฬะถะต</a>, ะฑะตัะฟะฐัะดะพะฝะฝะพ, ัะฐะผัะบะธ, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะตะท.html>ะฑะตะท</a> ะทะฐะทัะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััั.html>ัะพฬะฒะตััะธ</a>;</span> <span>: ะฝะฐััะฐะฟะพะผ, ะฝะฐััะฐะฟะธััะพ, ะฒะฝะฐะณะปัั, ัะฐะทััะฐะฑะธััะพ, ะฐัะฐะฟะธััะพ, ะพัะฐะปัะฝะพ;</span> <span>: ัะธะฝะธัะตัะบะธ;</span> <span>: ะฒะฝะฐะณะปัะบ</span></li>

***ะฝะฐะณะปะพััั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะพััั.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพััั</a> (9473)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปัะน</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nรกglyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะพััั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ostสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะพััั.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกglostสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะพััั.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพััะธ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะพััั.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพััะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะพััั.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปะพััะตะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>impudence, insolence, effrontery; cheek</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะปะพััั</b>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปััะพ.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปััะพ</a> (9508)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%83%D1%85%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปััะพ.html>ะณะปัฬัะพ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">glรบxo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%83%D1%85%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<ol><li>tightly, hermetically
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปััะพ.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปััะพ</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฐะดะตะปะฐัั.html>ะทะฐะดะตฬะปะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฒะตัั.html>ะดะฒะตัั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nรกgluxo</b> zadรฉlatสน dverสน</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to wall up a door</span></div></dd>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%83%D1%85%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</body>
***ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปัะน</a> (5779)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Inherited from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8Aamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะณะปั (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะณะปั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">naglลญ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">quick</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*naglั</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะปัะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกglyj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฝะฐะณะปะตะต (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะณะปะตะต (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะณะปะตะต</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฝะฐะณะปะตะน (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปะตฬะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>impudent, impertinent, insolent, barefaced</li></ol>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปัะดะตัั.html>ะณะปัะดะตฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gljadรฉtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8F%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะตัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะตฬัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagljadรฉtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li>to see enough
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปัะดะตัั.html>ะณะปัะดะตฬัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะตัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะตฬัััั</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">gljadรฉtสน ne <b>nagljadรฉtสนsja</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">never to get tired of looking (at someone/something)</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผั.html>ะั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพัั.html>ะผะพฬะถะตะผ</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะตัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะตฬัััั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะพั.html>ััะพั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">My ne mรณลพem <b>nagljadรฉtสนsja</b> na รฉtot vid.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">We are not sick of this sight/view / We can't get enough of this view.</span></dd><dd>(literally, โ<span class="e-literally">We may not <b>see enough</b> of this sight/view.</span>โ)</dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to feast one's eyes</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8F%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะปั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะตัั.html>ะดะตัั</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐัะฝัะน.html>ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐฬัะฝัะน</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะปัะด-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะต</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b>; ะฟะพัััะธะบั: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8F%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะฝะพััั.html

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะปัฬะดะฝัะน</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nagljรกdnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะพััั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ostสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BB%D1%8F%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะฝะพััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปัฬะดะฝะพััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagljรกdnostสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะปัะดะฝะพััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะปัฬะดะฝะพััะธ</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)
</p>
<ol><li>clearness, obviousness</li>
<li>use of visual methods, use of visual aids</li></ol>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝะฐฬัั</a> (10956)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะฝะฐัั.html>ะณะฝะฐัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gnatสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagnรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to catch up to</li>
<li>to equal (someone) in success</li>
<li>to make up for (lost time)</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to cause (an emotion) <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> someone</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝะตัะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝะตัะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagnetรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะณะฝะตััะธ</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to pump, to pressurize, to inflate</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to aggravate, to exacerbate (negative emotions)</li></ol>

***ะฝะฐะณะฝััั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝัฬัั</a> (17063)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะฝััั.html>ะณะฝััั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gnutสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝัฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagnรบtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะณะธะฑะฐัั</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to bend, to curve</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะฝััั.html>ะณะฝััั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะฝั</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝััััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝัฬัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagnรบtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะธะฑะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะธะฑะฐฬัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to stoop, to bend down, to bow</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝัฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nagnรบtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะฝััั.html>ะณะฝัฬ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัััั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, ะฝะตะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน,  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐัะฝัะน.html>ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐฬัะฝัะน</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 3b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะธะฑะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะธะฑะฐฬัััั</a>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะฐัะธะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะฐฬัะธะฒะฐัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagovรกrivatสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัั</a></b>)

<ol><li>to record, to read for recording, to have one's reading recorded</li>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=16" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฒะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฒะฐัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, ะฝะตะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัั</a>.

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฒะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฒะฐัั</b>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B_3"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะกะธะฝะพะฝะธะผั_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=34" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพฬั</a> (31942)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพฬั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagovรณr</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพฬัะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพฬัั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพฬัะพะฒ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>slander, calumny</li>
<li>incantation</li></ol>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=17" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพั.html>ะฒะพั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพะฒะพั-</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">govorรญtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagovorรญtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะฐัะธะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะฐฬัะธะฒะฐัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to record, to read for recording, to have one's reading recorded</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to slander</li>
<li>to say, to tell
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปัะฟะพััั.html>ะณะปัฬะฟะพััะตะน</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nagovorรญtสน</b> glรบpostej</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to say a lot of silly things</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัั</a></b> ะบะพะผั-ะปะธะฑะพ <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะฝะพะณะพ.html>ะผะฝะพฬะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะฟัะธััะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะฟัะธัฬัะฝะพะณะพ</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nagovorรญtสน</b> komรบ-libo mnรณgo neprijรกtnovo</i> โ <span class="e-translation">tell smb a lot of unpleasant things</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพ.html>ะฒะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>.

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nagovorรญtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagovorรญtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะฐัะธะฒะฐัััั (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะฐัะธะฒะฐัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to talk one's fill; to have a good long talk</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฒะพัะธฬัััั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐัะฝัะน.html>ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐฬัะฝัะน</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพะฒะพั-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะดะธัั.html>-ะธ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b>; ะฟะพัััะธะบั: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬะน</a> (11527)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*nagั</i>, ultimately from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*nogสทรณs</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">naked</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>; see there for the cognates.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagรณj</span>) (<i>no comparative</i>)
</p>
<ol><li>nude, naked, bare</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพะน</b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะณ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ะพะน</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

***ะฝะฐะณะพะปะพ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะปะพ.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะพะปะพ</a> (13749)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Apparently from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะปัะน.html>ะณะพฬะปะพ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gรณlo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>; but compare also <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬะน</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nagรณj</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">naked</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะปะพ.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะพะปะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกgolo</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>close to the skin, closely shaven
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะธัั.html>ัััะธัั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะปะพ.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะพะปะพ</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">striฤสน <b>nรกgolo</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">to shave one's head</span></div></dd></dl></li>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Apparently from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะปัะน.html>ะณะพฬะปะพ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gรณlo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, with stress shift (but see above).
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb_2">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะปะพ.html>ะฝะฐฬะณะพะปะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagolรณ</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>naked <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of metal</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>, drawn <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of a sword</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>, to the bare metal</li>
<li><i>This term needs a translation to English. Please help out and <b>add a translation</b>, then remove the text <code> |  | rfdef |  | </code>.</i></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะปะพ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพะป-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะพ</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagonjรกj</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬั</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬะธ</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬะธ</a></a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D0%B5%D0%B2amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬะตะฒ</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬะตะฒ</a></a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> telling-off, rating, scolding
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐัั.html>ะดะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬะน</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">datสน nagonjaj</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to give () a telling-off/rating/scolding; to rate</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะปััะธัั.html>ะฟะพะปััะธฬัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬะน</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">poluฤitสน nagonjaj</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to get a scolding; get into hot water; get it in the neck</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝัะน</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 6a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพะฝ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href="/w/index.php?title=-%D1%8F%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="-ัะน (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะฐะฝะธัะฐ.html>ัััะฐะฝะธฬัะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะพะฒะฐัั.html>ัััะตััะฒัฬะตั</a>)">-ัะน</a></b>.

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะฝััั.html>ะณะพะฝัฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gonjรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณะพะฝัฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagonjรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะฝะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณะฝะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to catch up to</li>
<li>to equal (someone) in success</li>
<li>to make up for (lost time)</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to cause (an emotion) <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> someone</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_3"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=30" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝััั</b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b> |  | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพะฝ-</b> |  ััััะธะบั: <b>-ั</b> |  ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_4"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=44" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝััั</b>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B_4"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะกะธะฝะพะฝะธะผั_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=48" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_5"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=58" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝััั</b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b> |  | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพะฝ-</b> |  ััััะธะบั: <b>-ั</b> |  ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b>.

<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต_5"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=61" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li> ะฟะตัะตะณะพะฝะบะพะน ะฟัะธะณะพัะฐะฒะปะธะฒะฐัั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒ.html>ะฒ</a> ะบะฐะบะพะผ-ะปะธะฑะพ (<a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฑััะฝะพ.html>ะพะฑัฬัะฝะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะพะปััะพะน.html>ะฑะพะปััะพฬะผ</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพะปะธัะตััะฒะพ.html>ะบะพะปะธฬัะตััะฒะต</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพััััััะฒะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะัััฬัััะฒัะตั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธะผะตั.html>ะฟัะธะผะตฬั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปะตฬะฝะธั</a> (ัะผ. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพััะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬััะต</a> (18581)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8C%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพััะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬััะต</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagรณrสนje</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพััะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬััั</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพััะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬััั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพััะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพฬัะธะน</a></b>)
