<ol><li>highland, upland <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">mountainous land</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8C%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพัะต.html>ะณะพัั</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span>ะต</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะดะฝะธะน.html>ััะตฬะดะฝะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 6*a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒ.html>ะฒ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะดะพะถะตััะฒะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ััะดะพฬะถะตััะฒะตะฝะฝะพะน</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:ะพัะพะฑะตะฝะฝะพ.html>ะพัะพฬะฑะตะฝะฝะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพััะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะฟะพััะธฬัะตัะบะพะน</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตัั.html>ัะตฬัะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพะฟัััะธะผัะน.html>ะดะพะฟัััะธฬะผะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะบะถะต.html>ัะฐฬะบะถะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพัะผะฐ.html>ัะพฬัะผะฐ</a> ะฟัะตะดะป. ะฟะฐะด. <a href = vnd.unilang:ะตะดะฐ.html>ะตฬะด</a>. ั. <i>ะฝะฐะณะพััะธ</i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพัั-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-j</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ะต</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8C%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพัะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณะพัะฐฬ</a> (19061)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพัะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณะพัะฐฬ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagotรก</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพัะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณะพัั</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)
</p>
<ol><li>nudity, bareness, nakedness</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพั.html>ัะฐฬ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะตะฝัะบะธะน.html>ะถะตฬะฝัะบะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 1-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 1d |   <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพัะผะฐ.html>ัะพฬัะผั</a> ะผะฝ. ั. ะฟัะตะดะฟะพะปะพะถะธัะตะปัะฝั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธะปะธ.html>ะธะปะธ</a> ะฝะตัะฟะพััะตะฑะธะผั.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะณ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะพั</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

***ะฝะฐะณะพัะพะฒะต.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพัะพะฒะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพัะพฬะฒะต</a> (10884)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะณะพัะพะฒะต</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gotรณve</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, with the second element having the form of a prepositional singular of a nonexistent noun based on the verb <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพัะพะฒะธัั.html>ะณะพัะพฬะฒะธัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">gotรณvitสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพัะพะฒะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพัะพฬะฒะต</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagotรณve</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>at call, in readiness, ready, prepared, on the lookout
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะตัะถะฐัั.html>ะดะตัะถะฐฬัั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพัะพะฒะต.html>ะฝะฐะณะพัะพฬะฒะต</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">derลพรกtสน <b>nagotรณve</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">to keep in readiness</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพั.html>ัะพฬ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฒะต</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณะพัะพะฒ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะต</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<ol><li>to steal a lot of, to plunder, to accumulate by robbing</li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะฑะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐฬะฑะธัั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>.

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะฐ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐฬะดะฐ</a> (3564)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic">Old Church Slavonic</a></span> <small>[Term?]</small>; compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Belarusian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Belarusian language">Belarusian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="be">ะฝะฐะณะฐัะพะดะฐ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Be-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">naharรณda</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Ukrainian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Ukrainian language">Ukrainian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="uk"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะณะพัะพะดะฐ (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะณะพัะพะดะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Uk-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nahorรณda</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, which were inherited from Old East Slavic.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐฬะดะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagrรกda</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐฬะดั</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐฬะดั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐฬะด</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>reward (something of value given in return for an act)</li>
<li>award</li>
<li>decoration</li></ol>

***ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธัั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธฬัั</a> (5972)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะณัะฐะดะธัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-gradรญtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagradรญtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to reward, to award</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณัะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดะธัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน.html>ะฟะตัะตัะพฬะดะฝัะน</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 4b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะฐฬัั</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะณัะฐะด-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะดะธัั.html>-ะธ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagraลพdรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to reward, to award</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณัะฐะถ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐัั.html>ะดะฐัั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน.html>ะฟะตัะตัะพฬะดะฝัะน</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะดะธฬัั</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะด-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

***ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตฬะฝะธะต</a> (17400)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตฬะฝะธะต</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagraลพdรฉnije</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตฬะฝะธั</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตฬะฝะธั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะฐะถะดะตฬะฝะธะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>rewarding; decorating (with a prize, medal, etc.)</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณัะฐะถ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะต.html>ะดะต</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะธ.html>ะฝะธ</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span>ะต</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะดะฝะธะน.html>ััะตฬะดะฝะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagrevรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to heat, to warm</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to swindle
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพัะตะฝะฝะธะบ.html>ะะพัะตฬะฝะฝะธะบ</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐฬะตั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะธะตะฝั.html>ะบะปะธะตฬะฝัะพะฒ</a>.</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Moลกรฉnnik <b>nagrevรกjet</b> klijรฉntov.</i> โ <span class="e-translation">A con artist swindles the clients.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagrรฉtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to heat, to warm
<dl><dd><span class="nyms imperfective"><span class="defdate">Imperfective:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณัะตัั.html>ะณัะตัั</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">gretสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to swindle
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะทะฝะฐะบะพะผะตั.html>ะะตะทะฝะฐะบะพฬะผะตั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตฬะป</a></b> ะผะตะฝั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะพ.html>ััะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะฑะปั.html>ััะฑะปะตฬะน</a>.</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Neznakรณmec <b>nagrรฉl</b> menjรก na sto rublรฉj.</i> โ <span class="e-translation">A stranger <b>swindled</b> me out of a hundred rubles.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณัะตัั.html>ะณัะตัั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน.html>ะฟะตัะตัะพฬะดะฝัะน</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 12a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตะฒะฐฬัั</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณัะต-</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะตัััั.html>ะฝะฐะณัะตฬัััั</a></b>

***ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตฬะฝะธะต</a> (15370)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตฬะฝะธะต</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagromoลพdรฉnije</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตฬะฝะธั</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตฬะฝะธั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตะฝะธะต.html>ะฝะฐะณัะพะผะพะถะดะตฬะฝะธะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>piling up, pileup, heap, heaping</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณะพะน.html>ะฝะฐฬะณ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพ.html>ะผะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะถะดะต<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะธ.html>ะฝะธ</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span>ะต</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะดะฝะธะน.html>ััะตฬะดะฝะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณัะพะผะพะถะด-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะตะฝะธj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ะต</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะณััะฑะธัั.html

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะถะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณััะถะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagruลพรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณััะทะธฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to load <i>(with)</i>, to lade <i>(with)</i>, to freight <i>(with)</i></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to load <i>(with)</i>, to saddle <i>(with)</i>, to lumber <i>(with)</i></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D1%83%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะณััะทะธฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagruzรญtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะถะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะณััะถะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to load <i>(with)</i>, to lade <i>(with)</i>, to freight <i>(with)</i></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to load <i>(with)</i>, to saddle <i>(with)</i>, to lumber <i>(with)</i>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฝ.html>ะตะณะพฬ</a> <b>ะฝะฐะณััะทะธะปะธ</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะพะฒัะน.html>ะฝะพฬะฒัะผะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฑัะทะฐะฝะฝะพััั.html>ะพะฑัฬะทะฐะฝะฝะพัััะผะธ</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">jevรณ <b>nagruzรญli</b> nรณvymi objรกzannostjami</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">he was loaded/taxed/charged/saddled/lumbered with new responsibilities</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D1%83%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณัั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะทะธัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณััะท-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะดะธัั.html>-ะธ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D1%83%D0%B7%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะทะบะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagrรบzka</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะทะบะธ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะทะบะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะทะพะบ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>loading</li>
<li>load, workload
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะตะฟะพะดะฐะฒะฐัะตะปััะบะธะน.html>ะฟัะตะฟะพะดะฐะฒะฐฬัะตะปััะบะฐั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะทะบะฐ</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">prepodavรกtelสนskaja <b>nagrรบzka</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">teaching <b>load</b></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะฟะพะปะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะฟะพฬะปะฝะฐั</a> <strong class="selflink"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะทะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะทะบะฐ</a></strong></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">nepรณlnaja nagrรบzka</i> โ <span class="e-translation">part-time</span> (literally, โ<span class="e-literally">incomplete <b>load</b></span>โ)</div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">engineering<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | medicine<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | electrical engineering</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> load

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D1%83%D0%B7%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะฝััั</a> (11482)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณััะฝััั.html>ะณััฬะฝััั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">grjรกnutสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะฝััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nagrjรกnutสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to come unexpectedly (out of the blue)
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะณััะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะณััฬะฝัะปะธ</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพััั.html>ะณะพััะธ</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nagrjรกnuli</b> gรณsti</i> โ <span class="e-translation">guests arrived unexpectedly</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to break out, <i>(cold)</i> to strike</li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณัั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝััั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, ะฝะตะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 3a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณััััะธ.html>ะณััััะธฬ</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณัั-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะฝั</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

***ะฝะฐะด.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a> (135)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_2">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nad</span>) <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">+ instrumental case</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li>above, over</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4amp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Before words beginning with certain awkward consonant clusters such as <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะผะฝ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mn-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฒั-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">vs-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, and <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ัะฝ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">sn-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, the variant form <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nado</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> is used.
</p>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะตะดะปะพะณ.html>ะัะตะดะปะพฬะณ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะบะถะต.html>ัะฐฬะบะถะต</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></b>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะปะพะฒะพ.html>ัะปะพฬะฒะพ</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปััััั.html>ะฃะฟะพััะตะฑะปัฬะตััั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a> ัะฒะพั. ะฟ.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒ.html>ะ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพัะตัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ัะพัะตัะฐฬะฝะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะบะพัะพััะน.html>ะฝะตฬะบะพัะพััะผะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะปะพะฒะพ.html>ัะปะพะฒะฐฬะผะธ</a>, ะฝะฐัะธะฝะฐััะธะผะธัั <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพ.html>ัะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตัะตะฝะธะต.html>ััะตัะตฬะฝะธั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะณะปะฐัะฝัะน.html>ัะพะณะปะฐฬัะฝัั</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธัะฟะพะปัะทะพะฒะฐัััั.html>ะธัะฟะพฬะปัะทัะตััั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะฐัะธะฐะฝั.html>ะฒะฐัะธะฐฬะฝั</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></i> (ะฑะตะทัะดะฐัะฝัะน): <i><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a> ะผะฝะพะน/ะผะฝะพั, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะปะพะฑ.html>ะปะฑะพฬะผ</a>, โฆ</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>--</b>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐ.html>ะดะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฒะฐัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, ะฝะตะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 13b.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดะฐ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะฒะฐ</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฐะฒะธฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadavรญtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะดะฐะฒะปะธะฒะฐัั</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to press, to push
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฐะฒะธฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะฝะพะฟะบะฐ.html>ะบะฝะพฬะฟะบั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadavรญtสน</b> na knรณpku</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to push/press the button</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to exert pressure <i>(on)</i>, to pressurize <i>(into)</i>, to pressure <i>(into)</i></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐ.html>ะดะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธัั.html>ะฒะธัั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดะฐะฒ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะดะธัั.html>-ะธ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

***ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐะฒะบะฐ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a> (22898)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadbรกvka</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐฬะฒะบะธ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐฬะฒะบะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฑะฐฬะฒะพะบ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>addition; markup; raise; extra charge</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฑะฐะฒ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะบะฐ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะตะฝัะบะธะน.html>ะถะตฬะฝัะบะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 1-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 3*a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐะด-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฑะฐะฒ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะผะตะบะฐะปะบะฐ.html>-ะบ</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะธะณะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฒะธฬะณะฐัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadvigรกtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะธะฝััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฒะธฬะฝัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to approach, to draw near, to impend, to be imminent</li>
<li>to come <i>(over)</i>, to move <i>(onto)</i></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=3" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดะฒะธ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะฐัั.html>ะณะฐัั</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, ะฝะตะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน,  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐัะฝัะน.html>ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐฬัะฝัะน</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 1a.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=16" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดะฒะธ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะฐัั.html>ะณะฐัั</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัั</b>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะธะฝััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฒะธฬะฝััััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadvรญnutสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะธะณะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฒะธฬะณะฐัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to approach, to draw near, to impend, to be imminent</li>
<li>to come <i>(over)</i>, to move <i>(onto)</i></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะธะฝััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฒะธฬะฝััั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadvรญnutสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะพะต.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฒะพะต</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกdvoje</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>in two, in half, into two parts
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพัะพะณะฐ.html>ะดะพัะพฬะณะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะปะธัััั.html>ัะฐะทะดะตะปะธฬะปะฐัั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะพะต.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฒะพะต</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">doroga razdelรญlasสน <b>nรกdvoje</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">the road forked</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> ambiguously, with a double meaning
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%B1%D1%83%D1%88%D0%BA%D0%B0_%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B5_%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะฐะฑััะบะฐ.html>ะฑะฐฬะฑััะบะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะพะต.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฒะพะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะฐะทะฐัั.html>ัะบะฐะทะฐฬะปะฐ</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะฐะฑััะบะฐ.html>ะฑะฐฬะฑััะบะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฒะพะต.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฒะพะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะฐะทะฐัั.html>ัะบะฐะทะฐฬะปะฐ</a></a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">bรกbuลกka nรกdvoje skazรกla</i> โ <span class="e-translation">we'll see what we'll see; you never can tell</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดะฒะพ<span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span>ะต</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>, ะพะฟัะตะดะตะปะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะตัะฐ.html>ะผะตฬัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะฟะตะฝั.html>ััะตฬะฟะตะฝะธ</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดะฒ-</b>; ััััะธะบัั: <b><a href="/w/index.php?title=-%D0%BEjamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="-ะพj (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะฐะฝะธัะฐ.html>ัััะฐะฝะธฬัะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะพะฒะฐัั.html>ัััะตััะฒัฬะตั</a>)">-ะพj</a>-ะต</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณัะพ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฑะธ<span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">ยท</span>ะต</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะตะดะฝะธะน.html>ััะตฬะดะฝะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐะด-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะณัะพะฑ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะธj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ะต</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
