***ะฝะฐะดะณัะพะฑะฝัะน.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะณัะพะฑะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะดะณัะพฬะฑะฝัะน</a> (24325)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะด-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nad-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณัะพะฑ.html>ะณัะพะฑ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">grob</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะฝัะน</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะณัะพะฑะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะดะณัะพฬะฑะฝัะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadgrรณbnyj</span>) (<i>no comparative</i>)
</p>
<ol><li>located on or over a grave</li>
<li>located or made on a gravestone
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะณัะพะฑะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะดะณัะพฬะฑะฝะฐั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัั.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฟะธัั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadgrรณbnaja</b> nรกdpisสน</i> โ <span class="e-translation"><b>gravestone</b> inscription</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>funerary <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">speech, weeping, etc.</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">located on or over a grave</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดะผะพะณะธะปัะฝัะน (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดะผะพะณะธะปัะฝัะน</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nadmogรญlสนnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>

<p>Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Belarusian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Belarusian language">Belarusian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="be">ะฝะฐะดะทัะฒะฐัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Be-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadzjavรกcสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะฒะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadevรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to put on, to get on</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะต.html>ะดะต</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฒะฐัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน.html>ะฟะตัะตัะพฬะดะฝัะน</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬัั</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดะต-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะฒะฐ</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***ะฝะฐะดะตะถะดะฐ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะถะดะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะถะดะฐ</a> (716)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=10" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic">Old Church Slavonic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะถะดะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะถะดะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadeลพda</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*nadeฤa</i>. Doublet of <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะดัะถะฐ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadjรณลพa</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, the inherited East Slavic form.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_3">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=12" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดะตะถ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐ.html>ะดะฐ</a></b>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%91%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดัะถ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะพ.html>ะฝะพ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>, ะพะฟัะตะดะตะปะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะฐัะตััะฒะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะบะฐฬัะตััะฒะตะฝะฝะพะต</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดัะถ-</b>; ััััะธะบัั: <b>-ะฝ-ะพ</b>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%91%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%91%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะถะฝะพััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะถะฝะพััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadjรณลพnostสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะถะฝะพััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะถะฝะพััะธ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะถะฝะพััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะถะฝะพััะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะถะฝะพััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะถะฝะพััะตะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>reliability; trustworthiness; dependability; security</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%91%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดัะถ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝะพััั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะตะฝัะบะธะน.html>ะถะตฬะฝัะบะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 3-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 8a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดัะถ-</b>; ััััะธะบัั: <b>-ะฝ-ะพััั</b>. <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดั-</b>; ััััะธะบัั: <b>-ะถ-ะฝ-ะพััั</b>. ัะผ. <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬััััั</a>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะถะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะถะฝัะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadjรณลพnyj</span>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%91%D0%B6%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดัะถ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝัะน</b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดัะถ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพััะดะพัะฝัะน.html>-ะฝ</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัะน</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%91%D0%B6%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะตัะฝัะน.html>ะฒะตฬัะฝัะน</a></li>
<li>โ</li>

***ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะป</a> (2759)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BBamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะป</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรฉl</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะปะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Bamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะปั</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะปั</a></a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะปะพะฒ</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะปะพะฒ</a></a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>(<i>historical</i>) Allotment land, which was the designation for pieces of land granted to peasants by their former landlords and the state with the reforms of the 1860s. The allotment lands had minimum and maximum sizes and were usually collectively owned.</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BBamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะป.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬะป</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรฉl</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">masculine singular past indicative perfective of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadรฉtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะปะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะปะธฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadelรญtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะปััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะปัฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to allot, to give, to provide

<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะปะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะปะธฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะปะฐััั.html>ะฒะปะฐฬัััั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadelรญtสน</b> vlรกstสนju</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to confer powers; vest rights</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะปะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะปะธฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะปะฝะพะผะพัะธะต.html>ะฟะพะปะฝะพะผะพฬัะธัะผะธ</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadelรญtสน</b> polnomรณฤijami</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to authorize; delegate authority</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to endow
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฝะฐ.html>ะพะฝะฐ</a> ะฝะฐะดะตะปะตะฝะฐ <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบัะฐัะพัะฐ.html>ะบัะฐัะพัะพฬะน</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะผ.html>ัะผะพฬะผ</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">onรก nadelenรก i krasotรณj, i umรณm</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">she is endowed with both beauty and brains</span></dd></dl></div></dd>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะต.html>ะดะต</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะปะธัั.html>ะปะธัั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดะตะป-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะดะธัั.html>-ะธ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<ol><li>to allot, to give, to provide

<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะปััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะปัฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะปะฐััั.html>ะฒะปะฐฬัััั</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadeljรกtสน</b> vlรกstสนju</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">to confer powers; vest rights</span></dd></dl></div></dd>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรฉtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะฒะฐฬัั</a></b>)

<ol><li>to put on, to get on</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะตัั.html>ะดะตัั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน.html>ะฟะตัะตัะพฬะดะฝัะน</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 15a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตะฒะฐฬัั</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดะต-</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬััััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรฉjatสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะฐะดะตััััั.html>ะฟะพะฝะฐะดะตฬััััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to hope
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬััััั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะดัะบะฐะทะบะฐ.html>ะฟะพะดัะบะฐฬะทะบั</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadรฉjatสนsja</b> na podskรกzku</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><b>to hope</b> for a hint</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to rely
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะตััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะตฬััััั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะดะดะตัะถะบะฐ.html>ะฟะพะดะดะตฬัะถะบั</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadรฉjatสนsja</b> na poddรฉrลพku</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><b>to rely</b> on a support</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะต.html>ะดะต</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ััั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, ะฝะตะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน,  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐัะฝัะน.html>ะฒะพะทะฒัะฐฬัะฝัะน</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 6a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะฐะดะตััััั.html>ะฟะพะฝะฐะดะตฬััััั</a>.

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดะต-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ั</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b>; ะฟะพัััะธะบั: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

***ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐฬัะตะปั</a> (6918)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐฬัะตะปั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadzirรกtelสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐฬัะตะปั</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐฬัะตะปะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐฬัะตะปะตะน</a></b>, <i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปัะฝะธัะฐ (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัะตะปัะฝะธัะฐ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>warden, turnkey, supervisor, overseer</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะธ.html>ะทะธ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะตะปั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 2a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดะทะธั-</b>; ััััะธะบัั: <b>-ะฐ-ัะตะปั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัั (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดะทะธัะฐัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadzirรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="None mention" lang="ru">-โ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span><sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-1"> | 1 | </a></sup>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B7%D0%BE%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะพั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะพฬั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadzรณr</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะพั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะพฬัะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะพั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะพฬัั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะทะพั.html>ะฝะฐะดะทะพฬัะพะฒ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>supervision</li>
<li>surveillance</li>
<li>inspectorate</li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะทะพั</b>

***ะฝะฐะดะปะตะถะฐัั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะปะตะถะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะปะตะถะฐฬัั</a> (6665)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Since the late 17th century. <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะด-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nad-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะปะตะถะฐัั.html>ะปะตะถะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">leลพรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, possibly a calque of <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/German_language" class="extiw" title="w:German language">German</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de">obliegen</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะปะตะถะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะปะตะถะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadleลพรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">impersonal<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | formal</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to have to <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">to do as a requirement</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะปะต<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะฐัั.html>ะถะฐัั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดะปะตะถ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%89%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<ol><li>proper, fitting, suitable

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะตะฝะฐ.html>ะผะตฬะฝ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝะพััั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะตะฝัะบะธะน.html>ะถะตฬะฝัะบะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 3-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 8a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

***ะฝะฐะดะผะตะฝะฝัะน.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะผะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะดะผะตฬะฝะฝัะน</a> (12248)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Inherited from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%8A%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%8Aamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดัะผะตะฝั (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดัะผะตะฝั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadลญmenลญ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">inflated, blown up</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/nad%D1%8Amen%D1%8Aamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/nadัmenั (page does not exist)">*nadัmenั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">inflated, blown up</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> - passive past participle of <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/nad%C7%ABtiamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/nadวซti (page does not exist)">*nadวซti</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">inflate, blow up</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Related to <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadรบtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะผะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะฐะดะผะตฬะฝะฝัะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadmรฉnnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>supercilious, haughty, arrogant</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒััะพะบะพะผะตัะฝัะน.html>ะฒััะพะบะพะผะตฬัะฝัะน</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vysokomรฉrnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒััะพะบะพะผะตัะฝัะน.html>ะฒััะพะบะพะผะตฬัะฝัะน</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะตะฝะตะฑัะตะถะธัะตะปัะฝัะน.html>ะฟัะตะฝะตะฑัะตะถะธฬัะตะปัะฝัะน</a>; ัะฐััะธัะฝ.: <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพัะดัะน.html>ะณะพฬัะดัะน</a>, ะบะธัะปะธะฒัะน, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะฐะฝะปะธะฒัะน.html>ัะฒะฐะฝะปะธฬะฒัะน</a></li>

</body>
***ะฝะฐะดะพ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a> (89)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">ะฝะฐะดั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadลญ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nado</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*nadั</i>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกdo</span>) (+ instrumental case)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">variant of <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nad</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> before words beginning with certain awkward consonant clusters such as <b>ะผะฝ-</b></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> above, over
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></b> ะผะฝะพะน</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nรกdo</b> mnoj</i> โ <span class="e-translation"><b>above</b> me</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nado</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%A3amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดะพะฑัฃ (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดะพะฑัฃ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadobฤ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from dative/locative singular of <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">ะฝะฐะดะพะฑะฐ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadoba</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/nadobaamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/nadoba (page does not exist)">*nadoba</a></i>, from <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/na-amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/na- (page does not exist)">*na-</a></i> + |  <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*doba</i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>The word combination, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a>, is used in combination with imperfective infinitive verbs. For example,
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะะต</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></b> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะตัะฐะปะธัััั.html>ะฟะตัะฐฬะปะธัััั</a></b>.</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ne <b>nรกdo</b> <b>peฤรกlitสนsja</b>.</i> โ <span class="e-translation">There is no need to be sad.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะะต</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></b> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะตัะถะฐัั.html>ะดะตัะถะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพัะฒะตั.html>ะพัะฒะตฬั</a>.</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ne <b>nรกdo</b> <b>derลพรกtสน</b> otvรฉt.</i> โ <span class="e-translation">There is no need to answer.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะะต</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพ</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑััั.html>ะฑัฬะปะพ</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะณะฐัั.html>ะฟัะณะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะตะปะพะบ.html>ะฑะตะปะพะบ</a>.</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ne <b>nรกdo</b> bรฝlo <b>pugรกtสน</b> bรฉlok.</i> โ <span class="e-translation">There was no need to scare the squirrels.</span></div></dd></dl>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพ.html>ะดะพ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะตะดะปะพะณ.html>ะัะตะดะปะพฬะณ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะบะถะต.html>ัะฐฬะบะถะต</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a></b>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะปะพะฒะพ.html>ัะปะพฬะฒะพ</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปััััั.html>ะฃะฟะพััะตะฑะปัฬะตััั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a> ัะฒะพั. ะฟ.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดะพ-</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพ.html>ะดะพ</a></b>
</p><p>ะัะตะดะธะบะฐัะธะฒ; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดะพ-</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐัั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐฬัั</a> (13505)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะดะพะตะด-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadojรฉd-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะฐัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-รกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadojedรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตฬััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to bore</li>
<li>to bother, to pester, to molest, to worry, to annoy, to plague</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadojedรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะปะธะฒัะน</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-livyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะปะธะฒัะน.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตฬะดะปะธะฒัะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadojรฉdlivyj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะปะธะฒะตะต (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะปะธะฒะตะต (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะปะธะฒะตะต</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะปะธะฒะตะน (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะปะธะฒะตะน (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะปะธะฒะตะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>tiresome, troublesome, annoying, boring, bothersome, bothering, pesky</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะดะพะฟะธัั.html>ะดะพ-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">do-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑััั.html>ะตััั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">jestสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Compare <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฟัะธะตะดะฐัััั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">prijedรกtสนsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตฬััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadojรฉstสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to bore
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฝะฐ.html>ะตะน</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตฬะปะพ</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธัะฐัั.html>ัะธัะฐฬัั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">jej <b>nadojรฉlo</b> ฤitรกtสน</i> โ <span class="e-translation">she is tired of reading</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to bother, to pester, to molest, to worry, to annoy, to plague
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฝ.html>ะพะฝ</a> ะผะฝะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพ.html>ะดะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะผะตััั.html>ัะผะตฬััะธ</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตฬะป</a></b></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">on mne do smรฉrti <b>nadojรฉl</b></i> โ <span class="e-translation">I'm bored to death with him</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพ.html>ะดะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑััั.html>ะตััั</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, ะฝะตะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | ^b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพะตะดะฐฬัั</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฝะฐะดะพะตั-</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐะดะพ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะตั-</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b>  | ะัะทะฝะตัะพะฒะฐ, ะััะตะผะพะฒะฐ, 1986 | .
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะดะพะปะณะพ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะปะณะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพฬะปะณะพ</a> (3235)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพะปะณะพ.html>ะฝะฐะดะพฬะปะณะพ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรณlgo</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>for long, for a long time</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพะป.html>ะดะพะป</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะณะพ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>, ะพะฑััะพััะตะปัััะฒะตะฝะฝะพะต, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒัะตะผั.html>ะฒัะตฬะผะตะฝะธ</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดะพะปะณ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะพ</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
