***ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a> (19241)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะดะพ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nado-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะฐัั.html>ัะฒะฐัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">rvatสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadorvรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to tear slightly</li>
<li>to overstrain, to overtax, to undermine
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะต.html>ัะฒะพะธฬ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะปะฐ.html>ัะธฬะปั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadorvรกtสน</b> svoรญ sรญly</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to overtax one's strength; knock oneself out</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะฑั.html>ัะตะฑะตฬ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะปะพั.html>ะณะพฬะปะพั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadorvรกtสน</b> sebรฉ gรณlos</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to overstrain one's voice</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดััะฐ.html>ะดััั</a> ะบะพะผั-ะปะธะฑะพ</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadorvรกtสน</b> duลกu komรบ-libo</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to rend smb's heart; harrow smb's soul</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะธะฒะพัะธะบ.html>ะถะธะฒะพฬัะธะบะธ</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadorvรกtสน</b> ลพivรณtiki</i> โ <span class="e-translation"> to split one's sides with laughter</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพ.html>ะดะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะฐัั.html>ัะฒะฐัั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐะดะพ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ัะฒ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadorvรกtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to tear slightly</li>
<li>to overstrain oneself, to exert oneself <a href="/w/index.php?title=to_the_utmostamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="to the utmost (page does not exist)">to the utmost</a>, to knock oneself out, to bust a gut</li>
<li>to shout, to cry, to <a href="/w/index.php?title=cry_at_the_top_of_one%27s_lungsamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="cry at the top of one | s lungs (page does not exist)">cry at the top of one's lungs</a></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadorvรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพ.html>ะดะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒ.html>ัะฒะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัััั</b>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัะฐฬัั</a> (28283)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะด-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nad-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะธัะฐัั.html>ะฟะธัะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pisรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadpisรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะดะฟะธััะฒะฐัั</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to label, to caption, to write an inscription on</li>
<li>to write <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">something that is above something else, e.g. a missing letter above the line</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะธ.html>ะฟะธ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะฐัั</b>

***ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัั.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฟะธัั</a> (1928)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadpisรกtสน</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss">to caption, to write an inscription on</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">โ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-สน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, with typical stress shift (compare <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะดะฟะธัั.html>ะฟะพฬะดะฟะธัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pรณdpisสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฐะฟะธัั.html>ะทะฐฬะฟะธัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">zรกpisสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, etc.).
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัั.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฟะธัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nรกdpisสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัั.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฟะธัะธ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัั.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฟะธัะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะธัั.html>ะฝะฐฬะดะฟะธัะตะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>inscription, writing</li>
<li>dedication <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">on a book</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li>address <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">on an envelope</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li>legend <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">on a coin, medal, map</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะด-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nad-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพัะบะฐ.html>ะฟะพฬัะบะฐ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pรณฤka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะฝะธะบ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะพัะตัะฝะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฟะพฬัะตัะฝะธะบ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadpรณฤeฤnik</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะพัะตัะฝะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฟะพฬัะตัะฝะธะบะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะพัะตัะฝะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฟะพฬัะตัะฝะธะบะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะฟะพัะตัะฝะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดะฟะพฬัะตัะฝะธะบะพะฒ</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะตั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝะธะบ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐะด-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะฟะพัะตั-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะฝะธะบ</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดัะฐ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะธัั</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะธัั.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธะด</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะตัะตัะพะดะฝัะน.html>ะฟะตัะตัะพฬะดะฝัะน</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> ัะฟััะถะตะฝะธั <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 4a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพัะฒะตัััะฒัััะธะน.html>ะกะพะพัะฒะตฬัััะฒัััะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะปะฐะณะพะป.html>ะณะปะฐะณะพฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a> | โ | ะฝะฐะดัะฐะธะฒะฐัั.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดัะฐj-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะดะธัั.html>-ะธ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฝะฐัะตะฝะธะต.html>ะะฝะฐัะตฬะฝะธะต</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะดัะตะท.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะตะท.html>ะฝะฐะดัะตฬะท</a> (29843)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B7amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Deverbal from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดัะตะทะฐัั (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดัะตะทะฐัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadrรฉzatสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B7amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะตะท.html>ะฝะฐะดัะตฬะท</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadrรฉz</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะตะท.html>ะฝะฐะดัะตฬะทะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะตะท.html>ะฝะฐะดัะตฬะทั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะตะท.html>ะฝะฐะดัะตฬะทะพะฒ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>incising, incision, slicing, notching</li>
<li>cut, incision, notch</li></ol>

<p>Deverbal of <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadryvรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B2amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒ.html>ะฝะฐะดััฬะฒ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadrรฝv</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒ.html>ะฝะฐะดััฬะฒะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒ.html>ะฝะฐะดััฬะฒั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒ.html>ะฝะฐะดััฬะฒะพะฒ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>slight tear, rent</li>
<li>breakdown, anguish
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฝ.html>ะพะฝ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะฒะพัะธัั.html>ะณะพะฒะพัะธฬะป</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒ.html>ะฝะฐะดััฬะฒะพะผ</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">on govorรญl s <b>nadrรฝvom</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">he spoke as if his heart was breaking</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะปะพั.html>ะณะพฬะปะพั</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฒััะฐัั.html>ะทะฒััะฐฬัะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒ.html>ะฝะฐะดััฬะฒะพะผ</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">gรณlos, zvuฤรกลกฤij s <b>nadrรฝvom</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">anguished voice</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

***ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a> (29260)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐะด-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nad-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ััะฒะฐัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ryvรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadryvรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to tear slightly</li>
<li>to overstrain, to overtax, to undermine
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะต.html>ัะฒะพะธฬ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะปะฐ.html>ัะธฬะปั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadryvรกtสน</b> svoรญ sรญly</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to overtax one's strength; knock oneself out</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะฑั.html>ัะตะฑะตฬ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะณะพะปะพั.html>ะณะพฬะปะพั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadryvรกtสน</b> sebรฉ gรณlos</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to overstrain one's voice</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดััะฐ.html>ะดััั</a> ะบะพะผั-ะปะธะฑะพ</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadryvรกtสน</b> duลกu komรบ-libo</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to rend smb's heart; harrow smb's soul</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะธะฒะพัะธะบ.html>ะถะธะฒะพฬัะธะบะธ</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadryvรกtสน</b> ลพivรณtiki</i> โ <span class="e-translation"> to split one's sides with laughter</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadryvรกtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดะพัะฒะฐฬัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to tear slightly</li>
<li>to overstrain oneself, to exert oneself <a href="/w/index.php?title=to_the_utmostamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="to the utmost (page does not exist)">to the utmost</a>, to knock oneself out, to bust a gut
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ััะฐะฝ.html>ััะฐฬะฝั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ั.html>ั</a> ะตัั <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัััั</a></b>!</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">stรกnu ja jeลกฤรณ <b>nadryvรกtสนsja</b>!</i> โ <span class="e-translation">I don't intend to bust a gut!</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัััั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพั.html>ะพั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพัะพั.html>ัะพฬัะพัะฐ</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nadryvรกtสนsja</b> ot xรณxota</i> โ <span class="e-translation"> split one's sides with laughter</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to shout, to cry, to <a href="/w/index.php?title=cry_at_the_top_of_one%27s_lungsamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="cry at the top of one | s lungs (page does not exist)">cry at the top of one's lungs</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะธัั.html>ะธัั</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะฐะบ.html>ะบะฐะบ</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬะตััั</a></b>!</i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">iลกสน, kak <b>nadryvรกjetsja</b>!</i> โ <span class="e-translation">hasn't he got a good pair of lungs!</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะฒะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadryvรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธะบ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดัะผะพฬัััะธะบ</a> (24015)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%81%D0%BC%D0%BE%D1%82%D1%80%D1%89%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดัะผะพฬัััะธะบ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadsmรณtrลกฤik</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดัะผะพฬัััะธะบะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดัะผะพฬัััะธะบะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธะบ.html>ะฝะฐะดัะผะพฬัััะธะบะพะฒ</a></b>, <i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%81%D0%BC%D0%BE%D1%82%D1%80%D1%89%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธัะฐ (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดัะผะพัััะธัะฐ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>overseer, supervisor; jailer</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%81%D0%BC%D0%BE%D1%82%D1%80%D1%89%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะผะพัั.html>ัะผะพัั</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัะธะบ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถัะบะพะน.html>ะผัะถัะบะพฬะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 2-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัััะพะนะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดัััะพฬะนะบะฐ</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadstrรณjka</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัััะพะนะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดัััะพฬะนะบะธ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัััะพะนะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดัััะพฬะนะบะธ</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัััะพะนะบะฐ.html>ะฝะฐะดัััะพฬะตะบ</a></b>)

<li> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฐะบััััะน.html>ะทะฐะบััฬัะพะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะถะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะพะพััะถะตฬะฝะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะตััะฝะธะน.html>ะฒะตฬััะฝะตะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะฐะปัะฑะฐ.html>ะฟะฐฬะปัะฑะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะดะฝะพ.html>ััฬะดะฝะฐ</a>, ัะฐัะฟะพะปะพะถะตะฝะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพั.html>ะพั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะพัั.html>ะฑะพััะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพ.html>ะดะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฑะพัั.html>ะฑะพััะฐ</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะพััััััะฒะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะัััฬัััะฒัะตั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธะผะตั.html>ะฟัะธะผะตฬั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะฟะพััะตะฑะปะตฬะฝะธั</a> (ัะผ. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B9%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B9%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=17" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะด.html>ะฝะฐะด</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะพะธัั.html>ัััะพะน</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะบะฐ</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ัััะตััะฒะธัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะกััะตััะฒะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะฝะตะพะดััะตะฒะปัะฝะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะตะฝัะบะธะน.html>ะถะตฬะฝัะบะธะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะด.html>ัะพะด</a>, 1-ะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธะต</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> 3*a  <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐะด-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ัััะพะน-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะผะตะบะฐะปะบะฐ.html>-ะบ</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะกะธะฝะพะฝะธะผั_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B9%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=21" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะพะฝะธะผ.html>ะกะธะฝะพฬะฝะธะผั</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a> (22301)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadรบtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ะฒะฐัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-vรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">naduvรกtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to inflate, to puff out, to blow up
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฝะฐ.html>ัะธฬะฝั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>naduvรกtสน</b> ลกรญnu</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to blow/pump up a tyre/tire</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะพะทะดััะฝัะน.html>ะฒะพะทะดัฬัะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐัะธะบ.html>ัะฐฬัะธะบ</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>naduvรกtสน</b> vozdรบลกnyj ลกรกrik</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to inflate (blow up) a balloon</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฟะฐัะฐัะตะปัะฝัะน.html>ัะฟะฐัะฐฬัะตะปัะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะธะปะตั.html>ะถะธะปะตฬั</a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>naduvรกtสน</b> spasรกtelสนnyj ลพilรฉt</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to inflate the life jacket</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C_%D1%89%D1%91%D0%BA%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะบะฐ.html>ััะบะธ</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะบะฐ.html>ััะบะธ</a></a></i> โ <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">naduvรกtสน ลกฤรณki</i> โ <span class="e-translation">to <a href="/w/index.php?title=be_puffed_upamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="be puffed up (page does not exist)">be puffed up</a>; give oneself airs</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to drift <i>(by wind)</i></li>
<li>to give someone a chill</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to dupe, to swindle</li></ol>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัััั</a> (25526)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">naduvรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">naduvรกtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">intransitive</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to fill out, to belly out, to swell out, to blow up, to inflate</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to be puffed up</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to sulk, to pout</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">naduvรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<ol><li>inflatable <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">able to be inflated</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฝะพะน.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฝะพฬะน</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธะปะฐะณะฐัะตะปัะฝะพะต.html>ะัะธะปะฐะณะฐฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพัะฝะพัะธัะตะปัะฝัะน.html>ะพัะฝะพัะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพะต</a>, | <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ 1b | .
<a href = vnd.unilang:ะบัะฐัะบะธะน.html>ะัะฐฬัะบะฐั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพัะผะฐ.html>ัะพฬัะผะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะผัะถ.html>ะผัะถ</a>. ั. <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธัะฟะพะปัะทะพะฒะฐัััั.html>ะธัะฟะพฬะปัะทัะตััั</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะฑัะฐะทะพะฒะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะฑัะฐะทะพะฒะฐฬะฝะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพััะฐะปัะฝะพะน.html>ะพััะฐะปัะฝัฬั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบัะฐัะบะธะน.html>ะบัะฐฬัะบะธั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพัะผะฐ.html>ัะพฬัะผ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะทะฐัััะดะฝะธัะตะปัะฝัะน.html>ะทะฐัััะดะฝะธฬัะตะปัะฝะพ</a>.

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะพัะธัะพ.html>ะฝะฐัะพัะธฬัะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธะดัะผะฐัั.html>ะฟัะธะดัฬะผะฐะฝะฝัะน</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะปะธัะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ะปะธััะฝะฝัะน</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะตััะตััะฒะตะฝะฝะพััั.html>ะตััะตฬััะฒะตะฝะฝะพััะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธะปะธ.html>ะธะปะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะพััะฐัะพัะฝัะน.html>ะดะพััะฐฬัะพัะฝัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพัะฝะพะฒะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพัะฝะพะฒะฐฬะฝะธะน</a> <span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-1"> |  1 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-2"> |  1 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-3"> |  1 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-4"> | โผ 1 | </a></sup></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะฐะฝะฝัะน.html>ะะฐะดัฬะผะฐะฝะฝะฐั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะฑัะปะฐ.html>ัะฐฬะฑัะปะฐ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐััะบะฐะท.html>ัะฐััะบะฐฬะทะฐ</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">[ะะฝะต] <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะฐะทะฐัััั.html>ะบะฐะทะฐฬะปะพัั</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ััะพ.html>ััะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะตัั.html>ะฒัะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะปะพะฒะตะบ.html>ะปัฬะดะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะถะธัั.html>ะถะธะฒัฬั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะปััะธะฒัะน.html>ัะฐะปััะธฬะฒะพะน</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=13" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะฐะฝะฐ.html>ะผะฐฬะฝ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะฝัะน</b>
</p><p>ะกััะฐะดะฐัะตะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธัะฐััะธะต.html>ะฟัะธัะฐฬััะธะต</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะตััะตะฝะฝัะน.html>ัะพะฒะตััะตฬะฝะฝะพะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒะธะด.html>ะฒะธฬะดะฐ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะพัะตะดัะธะน.html>ะฟัะพัะตฬะดัะตะณะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฒัะตะผั.html>ะฒัะตฬะผะตะฝะธ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธะฟ.html>ัะธะฟ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะบะปะพะฝะตะฝะธะต.html>ัะบะปะพะฝะตฬะฝะธั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐัะธั.html>ะบะปะฐััะธัะธะบะฐฬัะธะธ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฐ.html>ะ</a>. | ะะฐะปะธะทะฝัะบะฐ | โ | 1*a(2).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดัะผ-</b>; ััััะธะบัั: <b>-ะฐ-ะฝะฝ</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัะน</b>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬะผะฐัั</a> (10095)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ะฝะฐ-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดัะผะฐัั.html>ะดัฬะผะฐัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dรบmatสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะผะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬะผะฐัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรบmatสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to make up one's mind, to decide</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to devise, to invent</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะฐัั.html>ะผะฐัั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดัะผ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพะฝะธะผะฐัั.html>-ะฐ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬััะน</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรบtyj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฝะฐะดััะตะต (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดััะตะต (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดััะตะต</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฟะพะฝะฐะดััะตะน (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟะพ.html>ะฟะพ</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ะฝะฐะดััะตะน (page does not exist)">ะฝะฐะดััะตะน</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>swollen, increased in volume</li>
<li>arrogant, haughty</li>
<li>pompous</li>
<li>disgruntled, offended, angry</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ััะน</b>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรบtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to inflate, to puff out, to blow up

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดััั.html>ะดััั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดั-</b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัััั</a> (12614)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadรบtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ัั</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัััั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nadรบtสนsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐัััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัะฒะฐฬัััั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">intransitive</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to fill out, to belly out, to swell out, to blow up, to inflate</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to be puffed up</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to sulk, to pout</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััั.html>ะฝะฐะดัฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nadรบtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%88%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะดััะธัั.html>ะฝะฐะดััะธฬัั</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">naduลกรญtสน</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดััะธัั.html>ะดััะธฬัั</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to dab scent, to spray, to splash</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%88%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=16" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะดั<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะธัั.html>ัะธัั</a></b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะดัั-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะพััะดะธัั.html>-ะธ</a></b>; ะณะปะฐะณะพะปัะฝะพะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ะพะบะพะฝัะฐะฝะธะต.html>ะพะบะพะฝัะฐฬะฝะธะต</a>: <b>-ัั</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:ัะตะดะฐะบัะธัะพะฒะฐัั.html>ะะตะดะฐะบัะธฬัะพะฒะฐัั</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฐะทะดะตะป.html>ัะฐะทะดะตฬะป</a> ยซ<a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a>ยป"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะฐะฒะธัั.html>ะฟัะฐฬะฒะธัั</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะต<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะฐัั.html>ะดะฐัั</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ัั</b>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะต_ะธ_ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต_ัะฒะพะนััะฒะฐ"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะผะพััะพะปะพะณะธัะตัะบะธะน.html>ะะพััะพะปะพะณะธฬัะตัะบะธะต</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะธ.html>ะธ</a> ัะธะฝัะฐะบัะธัะตัะบะธะต <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะฒะพะนััะฒะพ.html>ัะฒะพฬะนััะฒะฐ</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐ.html>ะฝะฐ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ะต<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะดะธ.html>ะดะธ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะต.html>ะฝะต</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐัะตัะธะต.html>ะะฐัะตฬัะธะต</a>, ะพะฑััะพััะตะปัััะฒะตะฝะฝะพะต, <a href = vnd.unilang:ัะพะฒะพะบัะฟะฝะพััั.html>ัะพะฒะพะบัฬะฟะฝะพััะธ</a>; ะฝะตะธะทะผะตะฝัะตะผะพะต.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฟัะธััะฐะฒะบะฐ.html>ะัะธััะฐฬะฒะบะฐ</a>: <b>ะฝะฐ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:ะบะพัะตะฝั.html>ะบะพฬัะตะฝั</a>: <b>-ะตะดะธะฝ-</b>; ััััะธะบั: <b>-ะต</b> <sup> | ะขะธัะพะฝะพะฒ, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***ะฝะฐะตะทะด.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะตะทะด.html>ะฝะฐะตฬะทะด</a> (16055)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Deverbal of <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะตะทะถะฐัั.html>ะฝะฐะตะทะถะฐฬัั</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">najezลพรกtสน</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะตะทะด.html>ะฝะฐะตฬะทะด</a></strong> โข (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">najรฉzd</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะตะทะด.html>ะฝะฐะตฬะทะดะฐ</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะตะทะด.html>ะฝะฐะตฬะทะดั</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ะฝะฐะตะทะด.html>ะฝะฐะตฬะทะดะพะฒ</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>flying visit
